titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Muncipality Police Prison -- MARY, a Mulattress, about 47 years old, 5 feet 6 1/2 inches high ; says she belongs to MrBartlettFRANCES, a Dark Griffe, about 50 years old, 5 feet 5 1/4 inches high ; says she belongs to MrFashThe owners will please comply with the law respecting themJWORRALL, WardenNew Orleans, February 24, 18521aw 3w
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
